```py
>>> import numpy.ma as ma
>>> x = [[1., -2., 3.], [0.2, -0.7, 0.1]]
>>> mask = [[1, 1, 0], [0, 0, 1]]
>>> masked_x = ma.masked_array(x, mask)
>>> masked_x
masked_array(
 data=[[--, --, 3.0],
 [0.2, -0.7, --]],
 mask=[[ True,  True, False],
 [False, False,  True]],
 fill_value=1e+20)
>>> ma.min(masked_x)
-0.7
>>> ma.min(masked_x, axis=-1)
masked_array(data=[3.0, -0.7],
 mask=[False, False],
 fill_value=1e+20)
>>> ma.min(masked_x, axis=0, keepdims=True)
masked_array(data=[[0.2, -0.7, 3.0]],
 mask=[[False, False, False]],
 fill_value=1e+20)
>>> mask = [[1, 1, 1,], [1, 1, 1]]
>>> masked_x = ma.masked_array(x, mask)
>>> ma.min(masked_x, axis=0)
masked_array(data=[--, --, --],
 mask=[ True,  True,  True],
 fill_value=1e+20,
 dtype=float64) 
```
